Detailed Description

Purpose: performs matrix operations on large arrays of matrices.

Definition at line 184 of file MMat4x4Array.cpp.

void MMat4x4Array::Propagate ( unsigned int *  indices,
const MMat4x4 &  root = MMat4x4() 
)

there should be one index for every matrix in the array except for the first. This function goes through all matrices and pre-multiplies the current matrix in place by the matrix referenced by the coresponding index. The first matrix is transformed by root. Note that this is mainly useful for propagating transforms.

transform the first matrix in place.

for each row.

for each column.

copy back to the source.

burn through the matrices and transform.

if no index, skip.

for each row.

for each column.

copy back to the source.
